name: Psystrike
description: You materialize a psychic wave that shocks a creature. Make a ranged attack, dealing 2d6 + MOVE psychic damage on a hit.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d12 at level 5, 4d8 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.

effect.name: An appealing move that can be used repeatedly without boring the audience.
effect.effect: No penalty applied for repeating the move.
